text:
Local Government Amendment (Separate Rates) Act 2002

An Act to amend the Local Government Act 1993
[Royal Assent 19 December 2002]

Be it enacted by His Excellency the Governor of Tasmania, by and with the advice and consent of the Legislative Council and House of Assembly, in Parliament assembled, as follows:

1. Short title
    This Act may be cited as the Local Government Amendment (Separate Rates) Act 2002 .

2. Commencement
    This Act commences on the day on which this Act receives the Royal Assent.

3. Principal Act
    In this Act, the Local Government Act 1993 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government Act 1993 .

5.
The amendments effected by this section have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government Act 1993 .

6.
The amendments effected by this section have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government Act 1993 .

7.
The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government Act 1993 .

8.
The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government Act 1993 .

9.
The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government Act 1993 .

10.
The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government Act 1993 .

11. Validation
    A separate rate purported to have been made under the Local Government Act 1993 before the commencement of this Act is taken to have been validly made.
